targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_name) as "Devices Scanned",
  COUNT(DISTINCT metadata->'info'->>'Device') as "Unique Serials",
  COUNT(*) as "Total Scans",
  COUNT(DISTINCT metadata->'info'->>'Build') as "Firmware Versions"
FROM script_results 
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))

SELECT DISTINCT ON (device_name)
  device_name as "Device Name",
  host_name as "Host",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Device', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'Device') as "Device Type",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'S/N', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'serial_number') as "Serial Number",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'MacAddress', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'mac_address') as "MAC Address",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Build', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'software_version') as "Software Version",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'HW Version', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'hardware_version') as "Hardware Version",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'DOCSIS', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'docsis_version') as "DOCSIS Version",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Device_IP', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'ipv4_address') as "IP Address",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Gateway', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'default_gateway') as "Gateway",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'DNS', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'dns_servers') as "DNS Servers",
  metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'ipv4_lease_time' as "Lease Time",
  metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'ipv4_lease_expire' as "Lease Expires",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Uptime', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'system_uptime') as "Uptime",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Network', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'network_access') as "Network Access",
  started_at as "Last Scanned",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
ORDER BY device_name, started_at DESC

SELECT 
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Build', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'software_version') as metric,
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_name)::int as value
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND (metadata->'info'->>'Build' IS NOT NULL OR metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'software_version' IS NOT NULL)
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
GROUP BY COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Build', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'software_version')
ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT 
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'HW Version', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'hardware_version') as metric,
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_name)::int as value
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND (metadata->'info'->>'HW Version' IS NOT NULL OR metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'hardware_version' IS NOT NULL)
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
GROUP BY COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'HW Version', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'hardware_version')
ORDER BY value DESC

SELECT 
  device_name as "Device",
  host_name as "Host",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'S/N', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'serial_number') as "Serial",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'MacAddress', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'mac_address') as "MAC Address",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Device_IP', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'ipv4_address') as "IP Address",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Build', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'software_version') as "SW Version",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'HW Version', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'hardware_version') as "HW Version",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'DOCSIS', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'docsis_version') as "DOCSIS",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Network', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'network_access') as "Network",
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Uptime', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'system_uptime') as "Uptime",
  started_at as "Scanned At",
  ROUND(execution_time_ms::decimal / 1000, 1) as "Duration (s)",
  COALESCE(metadata->'extraction_summary'->>'fields_extracted', metadata->'device_info'->'extraction_summary'->>'fields_extracted') as "Fields Extracted",
  html_report_r2_url as "Report"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
ORDER BY started_at DESC
LIMIT 100

SELECT 
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Network', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'network_access', 'Unknown') as "Network Status",
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_name) as "Device Count"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
GROUP BY COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'Network', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'network_access')
ORDER BY "Device Count" DESC

SELECT 
  COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'DOCSIS', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'docsis_version', 'Unknown') as "DOCSIS Version",
  COUNT(DISTINCT device_name) as "Device Count"
FROM script_results
WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info')
  AND success = true
  AND $__timeFilter(started_at)
  AND ('${user_interface:csv}' = '' OR userinterface_name IN ($user_interface))
  AND ('${host:csv}' = '' OR host_name IN ($host))
  AND ('${device_name:csv}' = '' OR device_name IN ($device_name))
GROUP BY COALESCE(metadata->'info'->>'DOCSIS', metadata->'device_info'->'extracted_fields'->>'docsis_version')
ORDER BY "Device Count" DESC

list.label: User Interface
list.name: user_interface
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT userinterface_name FROM script_results WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info') AND userinterface_name IS NOT NULL ORDER BY userinterface_name

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT host_name FROM script_results WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info') ORDER BY host_name

list.label: Device Name
list.name: device_name
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT device_name FROM script_results WHERE script_name IN ('get_info', 'device_get_info') ORDER BY device_name
